data.text:
@DonderRots Hi, I am terribly sorry to hear your bag was delayed. You need to contact the baggage service at the airport you reported your bag for assistance with this. You can find all the phone numbers to our baggage services here: https://t.co/ZV9bTO3uo2
Kind regards, Rebecka

urls.title: Baggage

data.text:
@jonpetter Hej, jag är ledsen över att höra att du haft strul med din resa. Vänligen ring in till oss så vi kan hjälpa dig att hitta en lösning på er resa. Du hittar våra telefonnummer här: https://t.co/cIkJt9kPnF

Vänliga hälsningar, Rebecka

Kind regards, Rebecka

data.text:
@Daanpons Hi, is the ticket booked directly through SAS website/customer service or did you book through a travel agent? If booked through a travel agent please contact them for help with rebooking.

If booked through SAS, please connect to a live agent on our chat.

Best regards,
Anton.

data.text:
@SAntonishen I am truly sorry for the inconvenience, but sadly we are not able to assist with these cases over social media. If you have received a file reference for you report you can track the progress at https://t.co/2zwsPbhQFU

// Anton
@SAntonishen To make a report with Baggage Service online, please use this link https://t.co/lvfQqgxCC0

data.text:
@Elena68177240 Hi Elena
If you have made a report of lost baggage you can track it via this link https://t.co/yaDBpcxdM2 
You can also call baggage service for further information https://t.co/We1FdD7ZiM it can be that they are still tracking it.
Kind regards /Anna

data.text:
@utvik Hej, 
Vi kan skicka en påminnelse till customer care om att svara på ert ärende (då det är denna avdelning som har hand om detta) Hanteringstiden är mellan 6-8 veckor, om du väntat längre vänligen kontakta oss för att vi ska kunna skicka en påminnelse.
Vänliga hälsningar,
Stina

@hareshtrishna Hi, "The reimbursements of extra costs are always based on acceptable documentation, so remember to save all receipts. You need to prove the extent of your loss." this is stated on our website https://t.co/KQdOdrH9TM 
Here you can file a claim if you wish: https://t.co/kDAXvXUXIa

data.text:
@utvik Hej, 
För att obehöriga ej ska få tillgång till personlig information så kan vi inte visa case-nummer på våra offentliga sidor. Du är välkommen att kontakta oss via chatt eller telefon med ditt case-ID för att undersöka ärendet. 
Vänliga hälsningar, 
Stina

data.text:
@ASeth94 Hej, 

Jag beklagar att du upplever problem med att ändra din bokning på hemsidan. Du är välkommen att kontakta oss via chatt eller telefon för assistans med ombokning. 

Vänliga hälsningar, 
Stina

@hareshtrishna Hi, 
SAS considers 75 EUR/person and day as a reasonable amount during a baggage delay. Remember to save your receipts and send a written claim to https://t.co/kDAXvXUXIa

Kind regards,
Stina

data.text:
@bravoastronaut Hi. If you cannot check in online, you will need to check in at the airport. You can try with different browsers as it can solve the online issues you experience
//Henrik

@krystallove25 Hi. If your luggage is delayed you need to contact the luggage service at the airport which was your final destination for help. We do not know the status of these cases via twitter
//Henrik

data.text:
@EspenAntonsen Hej, har du testat boka med olika webbläsare för att se om du forfarande får samma felmeddelande?
//Henrik

@Stosskeil Hi, extra seat is not included in any of our tickets. You can see what is included via this link. https://t.co/4iCq1qARVM
Extra Seat is available, from the time check-in opens until two hours before departure. You can reserve an extra seat via My bookings or in the SAS App.

@edwinvdlin Hi, if your flight has been canceled, you can choose to cancel against a full refund or rebook to another option. Contact our customer service and we can help you with this https://t.co/b3QIqPk7bj
//Henrik

data.text:
@LCBrennan Hi! We always prioritize our customers' safety. Thus you can feel safe booking with us. However all trips to Tokyo are paused until June 30 due to the closure of Russian airspace.
Thank you for contacting us, welcome back should you have any other inquiries. Kind regards, Tiffany

Ha en fin dag, hälsningar Tiffany!

data.text: @DoNotSmokeWeed Hey. You may get a  bug on our webbsite . Please try to delete cookie and then wait 5-10 minutes before logging in again via Chrome and the wrong message will disappear. If you stil get this message please contact us by phone https://t.co/b3QIqPk7bj

data.text: @jswetrader Hi, You can book hotel by logging into your account, go to My EuroBonus and there you can use your points to book chosen hotel. Kind regards, Bahare
@adrafq Hi, You will get the refund to the same way that you have paid your booking. Kind regards, Bahare
@dano8217 Hi, No, unfortunately there is no plans for this at the moment. Kind regards, Bahare

@cwitso Hi, I recommend that you contact our customer service over the phone or our Live chat here: https://t.co/b3QIqPk7bj and they will help you to look for other flight options. Kind regards, Bahare

urls.title: Benefits and Privileges
urls.description: With Star Alliance Gold status you can enjoy more lounges than any other alliance – and bring a guest along with you. Whether it's great food and refreshments or a place to work or relax, you can experience it in our lounges. Catch a glimpse of what’s on offer in our latest film. We are delighted to confirm that your status equates to Star Alliance Gold. This status recognises that you are a very frequent traveller who has flown often on the Star Alliance network, entitling you to all the Star Alliance

urls.title: Star Alliance
urls.description: Star Alliance, Frankfurt, Germany. 384,141 likes · 2,467 talking about this · 58 were here. Star Alliance is a global network of 26 airlines, working together to make your travel experience seamless...

data.text:
@beeblebroxbeer Hi!
I can not answer to that here without accessing your booking, please contact us on live chat or phone with your booking-reference so we can have a look what happened! 
I advise you to not add sensitive information here as we can not help with this on Twitter.

Best / Emilia

data.text:
@MTK012955844 Hello,
We advise you to remove this post due to sensitive information and should you need further help then you're welcome to contact us via phone, live chat or messenger.
Thank you.

/ Emilia

@rolpos Hi again,
Our chat can not be full and is very rarely a long waiting time so I suggest that you contact us there! 
I am not sure what email you are referring to, but we do not send out any emails regarding the waiting time on chat. 

Best Regards,
Emilia

@jan_chlebny Hi,
Sorry to hear that!
The only way to get in contact with baggage service is via phone (https://t.co/We1FdDpAak) or if you go to the airport. They are in search for your baggage even if you do not receive any updates, read more here: https://t.co/KQdOdrYKLk

All Best / Emilia

urls.title: Baggage
Delayed, Lost and Damaged Baggage
urls.description: We transport your baggage with care. But if your baggage has been delayed, lost or damaged for some reason, here you can find helpful information »

data.text:
@lliwedd Hi,
If you're having trouble with payment then try to clear cache and cookies on the website or use another payment method, if this doesn't work then please call us so we can assist with your booking! 
https://t.co/b3QIqPk7bj

Best Regards,
Emilia
